pkgmetadata.longdescription: Access OpenDota Services in R // Provides a client for the API of OpenDota. OpenDota is a web service which is provide DOTA2 real time data. Data is collected through the Steam WebAPI. With ROpenDota you can easily grab the latest DOTA2 statistics in R programming such as latest match on official international competition, analyzing your or enemy performance to learn their strategies,etc. Please see https://github.com/rosdyana/ROpenDota for more information.
